post.body: hey! just wondering, what made you go vegetarian?
Had scrumptious, scrumptious spaghetti at 10 p.m. tonight, btw. Mmm.
Movie marathon at my dad's last night was fun, although today's Righteous Kill was probably a little too much for a 13 year old.
I just finished watching the DVD of Panic's Live in Chicago. Awesome as hell. :)
My legs hurt from all the cycling. Butt too. D:
Today was such a happy day. Got to go cycling at ECP with a couple of friends, didn't fall and found Panic's Live in Chicago DVD! :D
Hmmhmm life has been uneventful.. I don't think I even remember doing anything at all the past few days.
They're not selling Panic's Live in Chicago in Singapore or smth. I can't seem to find it anywhere :(
I bought a canvas pad today. It cost 10 times more than normal drawing block and only had ten sheets, but whatever. I'm still happeeee :)
insomnia's getting fun in a funny way.
totally ready to smash my head open on the keyboard right now. god.
My groundnut died. I guess I don't have green fingers after all. Oh well.
Holidays are such a bore. Especially when you're dead broke.
Feeling stoned after a two-night sleepover at Liyana's with no sleep and lots of horror movies and a hundred dollars worth of junk food.
I sneeze when it's hot.
I fixed my iPod all by myself :)
I'm not really sure but I think I just got a new half-sister.
Watching Shutter right now. I predict some paranoia for the next few days.
Ugh. Just had the most horrible lasagne ever.
Trying to figure out how AIM works and failing miserably. God, I am so blur(heh, Singlish).
My pillow's leaking feathers : l
For the zillionth time, life is so fucked up.
Trapped. No way out. No way am i getting in.
we'll see. I hope to have backup, but family's really screwed up right now.
Was having nice dreams about m&gs with bands and got woken up by a phone call. Tomorrow I shall die. Out of embarrassment, fear or whatever,
K my life is officially whack.
Holing myself up in my room for today. Life is shit.
Everything's so fucking fragile right now.
Feeling very, very shitty. My mom might be getting into one of her bipolar mood swings. God. I was hoping this wouldn't happen again.
I'm slightly bored of Twitter.
I realise I get a new obsession every month.
Kay homework's not finished. May time pass very very slowly so I'll be able to finish everything and sleep at 1 latest.
And if I do go bipolar, I hope I get highs and not lows. Fun(before you get dragged off to the loony bin)!
as compared to someone who doesn't have a family history of manic depression.
I wonder if I would go bipolar too if I had enough sleepless nights or stress? I'm supposed to have a higher chance of getting it or smth,
I haven't had much sleep lately. Miraculously, I managed to stay awake in class. But then again, I am sitting right in front of the teacher.
Trying to finish up my school work but everything's a distraction.
We made banana crumble today! Everyone had their orgasmic face on in the home ec room.
2 hours till i got to wake up again. Goodnight.
oh god there's math homework and it's due tomorrow. gah!
There's home econs tomorrow! Hope I don't flunk this year. :S
Woke up in time to watch spongeboob!
School was good, except my butt kept falling asleep during those pointless talks in the hall and studio.
Still. Awake. Urgh.
Great. Insomnia before the first day of school.
Hope that my first day won't be too bad.
It's 12 pm. I've been awake for an hour. School starts tmr, not moday. Homework's not done. I am dead meat.
Fall out boy's coming to singapore! I feel like squealing.
I need internet.
Ok i take back what i said. It's hard seeing my mom cry.
Slightly amused by a fight that went on between two manic people.
